name: Midnight Maze (TransGame668)
description:
Did you ever try walk in the midnight with a maze, Then just try this. It feels like you at 3 AM in the maze with some crickets sound and the maze look big. so there a flashlight (unlimited battery), arrow sign & minimap to help out of the maze. Don't worry you won't be afraid because no one will following you, Only wild grass in here. You start in the middle of maze. If you in the out of maze, wait for a few seconds when falling and finally you win it.

Controls: WASD / Arrow Key for Movement and Space for Jump.
